name: DNDINDER
description:
What? Your crush is on DnDinder?? We need to match with him.

Wait… you don’t have enough modifiers to do it. Time to score up your stats and not let cringe profiles mess up with your mood! Level up to seduce the boss of dating dungeon.

How to Play

You and your dates have 3 traits: science, sport, art, and their mods from -5 to 10.

Swipe right to add their states to yours and swipe left to ignore. If it is less than 0, then you lose health.

To match with your crush, you need to score points. They must be greater or equal.

Cringe dates can deal damage if they roll a dice better than your [score + mod].
